ygData.subject: RE: Broken Song
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, pretty simple.  Make it so casting levitate doesn t raise you in height by a set amount like it does now, but instead casting it raises you to a set
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, pretty simple. Make it so casting levitate doesn't raise you in
height by a set amount like it does now, but instead casting it raises you
to a set height above the terrain you are standing on. Obviously they
already do this or you couldn't 'pop' over things that are slightly higher
than you.

Kitasi

So whats the solution to all this common nonsense? Make it so when you
recast levitate, you don't raise in height. There, not too hard...now, if
only verant cared...
